title: Educational Analysis of Strategies Using Perceptual Mapping and Multidimensional Scaling

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational statistics, marketing theory, and data analysis tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Conducted asynchronously online, utilizing LMS-based discussion and assignment submission systems; learners are provided with digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Independently generate perceptual maps using multidimensional scaling (MDS) with real corporate data.
Based on perceptual mapping interpretation results, competitive positioning strategies can be quantitatively evaluated.
Visualized analytical reports can be created using open-source analysis tools (ggplot2, matplotlib) based on R or Python.

resources: LMS Platform with Jupyter Notebook Integration Support
Multidimensional Scaling (MDS) Practice Dataset (5+ Industry-Specific Types)
Video Tutorials (10 Sessions, 15-Minute Segments by Analysis Phase)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
